compounddef.title: Build & Flash SWAN Module (ESP32) in VS Code

detaileddescription.para: This guide explains how to build and flash the SWAN module firmware using Visual Studio Code and ESP-IDF.

listitem.para: ESP-IDF Download and install the ESP-IDF from https://docs.espressif.com/projects/esp-idf/en/latest/esp32/get-started/.

VS Code Extensions Install the following in VS Code:
ESP-IDF (by Espressif)
C/C++ (for IntelliSense)
Python ESP-IDF requires Python (usually ≥3.8). Make sure python and pip are in your PATH.

sect1.title: 2️⃣ Open the Project in VS Code

listitem.para: Select the root folder of the SWAN module project (where CMakeLists.txt is located).
Press Ctrl+Shift+P → ESP-IDF: Configure ESP-IDF Extension.

Follow the prompts to set:
ESP-IDF directory
Python interpreter
Serial port (optional)

blockquote.para: The extension automatically sets environment variables for idf.py.
